resources.string: נא הפעל את היישום Carbon במחשבך.
לא נמצא חיבור WiFi. -האם הWiFi במכשירך פועל?
התחבר כדי לסנכרן עם המכשירים האחרים שלך
אירעה שגיאה בעת איחזור המכשירים שלך.
אירעה שגיאה בעת איחזור רשימת היישומים שלך.
This app has been protected from being backed up. Please download it from Google Play first before syncing the app data.\n\nPress OK to continue to Google Play.
Install Carbon on your other devices to sync your data! Click to refresh.
Restore apps from the USB storage on this %s.
Press OK to remove %s from the list of devices managed by Carbon.\n\nYou should also remove the Carbon application from that device to complete uninstallation.
An error occurred while performing your app backup. A log of the error has been sent to ClockworkMod.\n\nClick Backup to attempt to backup the remaining apps.
You have logged into your Google Drive Account.
An error occurred while performing your app restore. A log of the error has been sent to ClockworkMod.\n\nClick Restore to attempt to restore the remaining apps.
An error occurred while performing your app sync. A log of the error has been sent to ClockworkMod.\n\nClick Sync to attempt to sync the remaining apps.
Welcome to Carbon!\n\nLet\'s log into your Google Account so you can backup to your Google Drive and sync with your other devices!
That\'s no problem! You can still backup and restore from your phone\'s USB storage.
No backups were found on your %s. Maybe you should make some!
מחק גיבוי? אין אפשרות לבטל את הפעולה
An error occurred while deleting your backup. A log of the error has been sent to ClockworkMod.
Carbon will now check for root permissions. If the root permission dialog pops up, please set it to \"always allow\".
%1$s has disallowed backup of application data. Please leave a comment with the developer of %2$s and ask them to allow application data backup.
You will be prompted to download the app from Google Play before restoring.
Delete saved backup list? This can not be undone.
This backup only contains the app data, and not the app. You must first download the app from Google Play.\n\nPress OK to continue to Google Play.

Waiting for the Carbon Desktop application to enable application backup on your Android...

Please get Carbon Desktop for your PC:

%s

Welcome!

To get started with Carbon, you must first enable application backup by connecting to the Carbon Desktop application.

Please visit the Carbon website on your PC for instructions:
Please connect your Android to your PC\'s USB...
In your Android Settings, you will find a setting to enable USB debugging.\n\nEnable the setting, then press back to return to Carbon.

Android application backups must be enabled with the Carbon Desktop application.

Canceling this process will result in Carbon not working properly.

Are you sure you want to cancel?
Android app backup enabled! You can now disconnect from your PC.\n\nPlease note: if you turn your Android off, you will need to reconnect to Carbon Desktop to enable application backup again.
Unable to login. You have not set up any Google Accounts.
Superuser is outdated. It is recommended that you upgrade to SuperSU.\n\nYou can find SuperSU on Google Play.
An error occurred while recovering your purchase.
There was no license found for that PayPal email.
Would you like to hide %s? It will be moved to the bottom of the app list and not be selected by "Select All".

There are no backups scheduled.
To schedule a backup:

1) Go to the backup list
2) Choose the apps you want to backup
3) Click Backup
4)Choose schedule
Scheduled backups are a Carbon Premium feature.
Buy Carbon Premium to access all the Carbon features!
Your app restore is complete.\n\nIf you have a moment, I\'d appreciate it if you rated Carbon on Google Play!
Tip:\n\nTry swiping up bottom panel to reveal more options, like Select All.
Your Android USB is in MTP mode. You may need to switch it to PTP.
In your Android Settings, you will find a setting to enable Camera (PTP) mode.\n\nEnable the setting, then press back to return to Carbon.
Android\'s backup mechanism only works with the primary device user.\n\nCarbon will now exit. Please open Carbon with the primary user!

An error occurred while performing your app backup.

This error may be caused by having a Desktop Backup Password.

Please verify your Desktop Backup Password is a blank password, then press back to return to Carbon.
Use key events instead of tap events to automate the backup and restore confirmation windows.
Restore apps from the external SD Card in this %s.
There was an error executing the Superuser command. Carbon will fall back to non root usage.\n\nError: %s
לא היתה אפשרות לקרוא מכרטיס זיכרון חיצוני.
User defined words and predictive text input
Configure the encryption password or Desktop Backup password used by your device.
%s apps must be downloaded from Google Play before restoring.\n\nClick the unchecked apps to be directed to their Google Play listing.
Your Android is encrypted. To perform a backup, please enter this Android\'s password or PIN.
Your Android is encrypted. To perform a restore, please enter this Android\'s password or PIN.
Restore apps from the internal storage on this %s.
